languages.text: На Даргонусе (система Мундус Валанциус) готовится пышное торжество. Руководит его подготовкой церемониймейстер, ожидающий во дворце.

traits.locale_text: На Даргонусе, столице торговой империи, готовится пышное торжество. Руководит его подготовкой церемониймейстер, ожидающий во дворце.

languages.text: A grand ceremony is about to take place on Dargonus in the Mundus Valancius system. Overseeing the preparations is the master of ceremonies, who is waiting in the palace.
languages.original_text: На Даргонусе (система Мундус Валанциус) готовится пышное торжество. Руководит его подготовкой церемониймейстер, ожидающий во дворце.

traits.locale_text: A grand ceremony is about to take place on Dargonus in the Mundus Valancius system. Overseeing the preparations is the master of ceremonies, who is waiting in the palace.
A grand ceremony is about to take place on Dargonus in the Mundus Valancius system. Overseeing the preparations is the master of ceremonies, who is waiting in the palace.
A grand ceremony is about to take place on Dargonus in the Mundus Valancius system. Overseeing the preparations is the master of ceremonies, who is waiting in the palace.
A grand ceremony is about to take place on Dargonus in the Mundus Valancius system. Overseeing the preparations is the master of ceremonies, who is waiting in the palace.

languages.text: 一场盛典即将在瓦兰修斯领的达戈努斯举行。盛典的准备工作由祭仪大师负责，大师此刻正在宫殿中，等待行商浪人接见。
languages.original_text: A grand ceremony is about to take place on Dargonus in the Mundus Valancius system. Overseeing the preparations is the master of ceremonies, who is waiting in the palace.

traits.locale_text: 一场盛典即将在瓦兰修斯领的达戈努斯举行。盛典的准备工作由祭仪大师负责，大师此刻正在宫殿中，等待行商浪人接见。

languages.text: ムンドゥス・ヴァランシウス星系のダルゴナスで盛大な式典が行われようとしている。準備を監督するのは帝殿で待機している式典の責任者だ。
languages.original_text: A grand ceremony is about to take place on Dargonus in the Mundus Valancius system. Overseeing the preparations is the master of ceremonies, who is waiting in the palace.

traits.locale_text: ムンドゥス・ヴァランシウス星系のダルゴナスで盛大な式典が行われようとしている。準備を監督するのは帝殿で待機している式典の責任者だ。

languages.text: Está a punto de celebrarse una ceremonia por todo lo alto en Dargonus, en el sistema Mundus Valancius. El maestro de ceremonias, encargado de las preparaciones, te espera en el palacio.
languages.original_text: A grand ceremony is about to take place on Dargonus in the Mundus Valancius system. Overseeing the preparations is the master of ceremonies, who is waiting in the palace.

traits.locale_text: Está a punto de celebrarse una ceremonia por todo lo alto en Dargonus, en el sistema Mundus Valancius. El maestro de ceremonias, encargado de las preparaciones, te espera en el palacio.

languages.text: Auf Dargonus im Mundus-Valancius-System beginnt in Kürze eine prächtige Zeremonie. Der im Palast wartende Zeremonienmeister wacht aufmerksam über sämtliche Vorbereitungen.
languages.original_text: A grand ceremony is about to take place on Dargonus in the Mundus Valancius system. Overseeing the preparations is the master of ceremonies, who is waiting in the palace.

traits.locale_text: Auf Dargonus im Mundus-Valancius-System beginnt in Kürze eine prächtige Zeremonie. Der im Palast wartende Zeremonienmeister wacht aufmerksam über sämtliche Vorbereitungen.

languages.text: Une grande cérémonie est sur le point d'avoir lieu sur Dargonus, dans le système Mundus Valancius. La maîtresse des cérémonies, chargée des préparatifs de la fête, attend dans le palais.
languages.original_text: A grand ceremony is about to take place on Dargonus in the Mundus Valancius system. Overseeing the preparations is the master of ceremonies, who is waiting in the palace.

traits.locale_text: Une grande cérémonie est sur le point d'avoir lieu sur Dargonus, dans le système Mundus Valancius. La maîtresse des cérémonies, chargée des préparatifs de la fête, attend dans le palais.

languages.text: Mundus Valancius sistemindeki Dargonus'ta büyük bir tören gerçekleştirilmek üzere. Hazırlıklarla saraydaki teşrifatçı ilgileniyor.
languages.original_text: A grand ceremony is about to take place on Dargonus in the Mundus Valancius system. Overseeing the preparations is the master of ceremonies, who is waiting in the palace.

traits.locale_text: Mundus Valancius sistemindeki Dargonus'ta büyük bir seremoni gerçekleştirilmek üzere. Hazırlıklarla saraydaki teşrifatçı ilgileniyor.
